text: 16|125|yuktidiksayeatu kutiyum, sadupadesam mukhenayum ninre raksitavinre margattilekk ni ksanicc kealluka. erravum nalla ritiyil avarumayi sanvadam natattukayum ceyyuka. tirccayayum ninre raksitav tanre margam vitt pilacc peayavarepparri nallavannam ariyunnavanatre. sanmargam prapiccavarepparriyum nallavannam ariyunnavanatre
